dadosPortal: select * from dados_portal where cad_plano = '--nome_plano--' AND datacomp = '--data_base_carga--' order by chave, contr_eventocod
dadosPortalLista: select * from dados_portal where chave IN (--lista_dados_carga--) AND cad_plano = '--nome_plano--' AND datacomp = '--data_base_carga--' order by chave, contr_eventocod
historicoContrib: WITH hc AS (SELECT chave, anomes AS "anoMes", pago, valorbase as valor FROM dados_portal_hist_contrib WHERE chave IN (--lista_dados_carga--) AND cad_plano = '--nome_plano--' AND valorbase > 0 order by chave, datacomp) SELECT chave, json_agg(row_to_json(hc)) as jsonhistcontrib FROM hc group by chave order by chave
